mapper.select: INSERT INTO mycat_waybillno.t_mat_rookie_wb_use_order_w ( WAYBILL_NO, BIZ_ID, COMPANY_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, BRANCH_NAME, SELLER_ID, CONSIGNEE_NAME, CONSIGNEE_PHONE, SEND_PROVINCE_NAME, SEND_PROVINCE_CODE, SEND_CITY_NAME, SEND_CITY_CODE, SEND_AREA_NAME, SEND_AREA_CODE, SEND_TOWN_NAME, SEND_TOWN_CODE, SEND_DETAIL_ADDRESS, CONSIGNEE_PROVINCE_NAME, CONSIGNEE_PROVINCE_CODE, CONSIGNEE_CITY_NAME, CONSIGNEE_CITY_CODE, CONSIGNEE_AREA_NAME, CONSIGNEE_AREA_CODE, CONSIGNEE_TOWN_NAME, CONSIGNEE_TOWN_CODE, CONSIGNEE_DETAIL_ADDRESS, CURTIME, STATUS, SENDER_PHONE, SENDER_NAME, DA_TOU_BI, WEIGHT, VOLUME, PRODUCT_TYPE, IS_ALIORDER, MSG_VERSION, SELLER_NAME, BIZ_INDEX, CONSIGNEE_mobile, sender_mobile, orderChanel, version, customerCode, empCode, back_1, back_2, materielCode )values ( #{rookie.WAYBILL_NO}, #{rookie.BIZ_ID}, 'YTO', #{rookie.BRANCH_CODE}, #{rookie.BRANCH_CODE}, #{rookie.SELLER_ID}, '李四', NULL, '上海', '021', '上海市', '310000', '青浦区', '310118', NULL, NULL, '富强大街1344号', '上海', '021', '上海市', '310000', '闵行区', '310112', NULL, NULL, '七宝镇七宝老街1号', #{rookie.CURTIME}, '2', NULL, '张三', '300', NULL, NULL, 'STANDARD_EXPRESS', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, '15921108453', '15921108467', 'TAOBAO', '1540204715129', #{rookie.customerCode}, NULL, #{rookie.back_1}, NULL, NULL )
